stats.title: Clientes
stats.sqlQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client WHERE deleted_at IS NULL

stats.title: Total em vendas
stats.sqlQuery:
SELECT 
  REPLACE(FORMAT(SUM(op.quantity * op.product_price), 2), '.', ',') AS total_formatado
FROM `order` o
INNER JOIN order_product op ON op.order_id = o.id
WHERE o.payment_status = 'Pago'
  AND o.order_status = 'Finalizado'
  AND o.deleted_at IS NULL AND op.deleted_at IS NULL

cards.title: Novos clientes (últimos 7 dias)
cards.sqlQuery:
SELECT
  DATE(created_at) AS dia,
  COUNT(*) AS novos_clientes
FROM client
WHERE (created_at >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND deleted_at IS NULL
GROUP BY DATE(created_at)
ORDER BY dia ASC;

cards.title: Pedidos finalizados (últimos 7 dias)
cards.sqlQuery:
SELECT
  DATE(updated_at) AS dia,
  COUNT(*) AS novos_pedidos
FROM `order`
WHERE updated_at >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY
AND deleted_at IS NULL AND order_status = 'Finalizado'
GROUP BY DATE(updated_at)
ORDER BY dia ASC;
